message.content: {"id": "18915", "title": "Bug 18915 [Preferences] switching between erroneous preferences pages should generate error, not warning.", "description": "When switching between erroneous preferences pages, a warning message is displayed instead of an error message. This behavior is inconsistent and misleading to the user.", "OB": "Currently, when a user navigates to a preferences page that contains errors and then navigates to another preferences page with errors, a warning message is displayed.", "EB": "The expected behavior is to display an error message instead of a warning message when switching between erroneous preferences pages. This will provide clear feedback to the user about the presence of errors.", "SR": "To fix this bug, modify the preferences page navigation logic to display an error message instead of a warning message when switching between erroneous preferences pages."}
